overview: Scott Hazdra serves as Chief Security Officer of Canopy Financial, Inc. Mr. Hazdra joined Canopy in 2006 and leads its security and systems management practices and advised Fortune 100 clients on matters of information technology security strategies, security practices and processes, and implementing effective security policies for corporate security compliance. Mr. Hazdra has held leadership senior engineering positions at Siemens, R.R. Donnelly, Harris Bank and 3Com. He has been certified by Cisco Systems, Siemens, 3Com, Avaya, Citrix, Microsoft and TIA and is a Member of the Information Systems Security Association (ISSA) and the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE). Mr. Hazdra is a graduate of Arizona State University.
